GenericProperty.Name: X
GenericProperty.Description: X position of the item on a map

GenericProperty.Name: Y
GenericProperty.Description: Y position of the item on a map

GenericProperty.Name: Width
GenericProperty.Description: Width in pixels of the map

GenericProperty.Name: Height
GenericProperty.Description: Height in pixels of the map

GenericProperty.Name: GeneratorApp
GenericProperty.Description: App that generated the map tiles

GenericProperty.Name: FileExtension
GenericProperty.Description: File extension for map tiles (jpg, png)

GenericProperty.Name: Locked
GenericProperty.Description: Whether the overlay can be moved by the user

GenericProperty.Name: SectionLink
GenericProperty.Description: The overlay links to this Section

GenericProperty.Name: HeaderText
GenericProperty.Description: Optional header text for the section

GenericProperty.Name: BodyText
GenericProperty.Description: Optional body html for the section

GenericProperty.Name: Copyright
GenericProperty.Description: Copyright statement for the World content

Template.Name: Adventure
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

<%
    var json = new BlackDragon.Umbraco.JsonGenerator().GetAdventureJson();
    Response.Clear();
    Response.Cache.SetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory(false);
    Response.Cache.SetCacheability(HttpCacheability.NoCache);
    Response.Cache.SetNoStore();
    Response.Cache.SetExpires(DateTime.Now);
    Response.Cache.SetValidUntilExpires(true);

    Response.Write(json);
    Response.ContentType = "application/json";
    Response.End();
 %>

Template.Name: BaseContent
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/umbraco/masterpages/default.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %>
<asp:Content ContentPlaceHolderID="ContentPlaceHolderDefault" runat="server"> <html width="768"> <head runat="server"> <link href="~/css/default.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/> <script type="text/javascript" src="~/scripts/default.js"></script> <!--<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width; initial-scale=1.0; maximum-scale=1.0; user-scalable=0;" />--> <title><umbraco:Item field="title" stripParagraph="true" convertLineBreaks="true" runat="server" /></title> </head> <body> <asp:ContentPlaceHolder ID="BodyContentCtrl" runat="server">
</asp:ContentPlaceHolder> </body> </html> </asp:Content>

Template.Name: Section
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/masterpages/BaseContent.master" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <%@ Import Namespace="BlackDragon.Umbraco" %>

<% if (showHeaderText) { %>

<% } %> <% if (showBodyText) { %> <% } %>

Template.Name: World
Template.Design:
<%@ Master Language="C#" AutoEventWireup="true" %>

<%
    var json = new BlackDragon.Umbraco.JsonGenerator().GetWorldJson();
    Response.Clear();
    Response.Cache.SetAllowResponseInBrowserHistory(false);
    Response.Cache.SetCacheability(HttpCacheability.NoCache);
    Response.Cache.SetNoStore();
    Response.Cache.SetExpires(DateTime.Now);
    Response.Cache.SetValidUntilExpires(true);

    Response.Write(json);
    Response.ContentType = "application/json";
    Response.End();
 %>

Stylesheet.Name: default
